scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build -w @react-sigma/core -w @react-sigma/layout-core -w @react-sigma/layout-circlepack -w @react-sigma/layout-circular -w @react-sigma/layout-force -w @react-sigma/layout-forceatlas2 -w @react-sigma/layout-noverlap -w @react-sigma/layout-random -w @react-sigma/examples
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.start: concurrently -n lint,compile,core,layout-core,layout-circlepack,layout-circular,layout-force,layout-forceatlas2,layout-noverlap,layout-random,storybook,website 'npm run lint -- --watch' 'npm run tsc -- --watch' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/core' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-core' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-circlepack' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-circular' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-force' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-forceatlas2' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-noverlap' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/layout-random' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/storybook' 'npm run start --workspace=@react-sigma/website'
